Build ID:  I20070625-1500

Steps To Reproduce:
1. Open a file that is not "runnable on server"
2. Click a launch button (e.g. debug and run)
3. Error log shows Unhandled event loop exception

All because RunOnServerActionDelegate assumes at least one artifact is returned.

Fix is to replace:

// TODO - multiple module artifacts
			IModuleArtifact moduleArtifact = moduleArtifacts[0];
			
with

// TODO - multiple module artifacts
			IModuleArtifact moduleArtifact = null;
if(moduleArtifacts==null) moduleArtifact = moduleArtifacts[0];

full trace:
